questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a renewable resource?
questions.explanation: Fossil fuels are not a renewable resource - they cannot be replenished in a short period of time.

questions.question: What is the capital city of Australia?
questions.explanation: The capital city of Australia is Canberra.

questions.question: What is the largest ocean in the world?
questions.explanation: The largest ocean in the world is the Pacific Ocean!

questions.question: Which of the following countries is located entirely in the Southern Hemisphere?
questions.explanation: Australia is located below the equator, so it is located entirely in the Southern Hemisphere.

questions.question: The equator is an imaginary line that divides the Earth into:
questions.explanation: The equator is a circle of latitude that divides Earth into Northern and Southern Hemispheres

questions.question: Which of the following continents is the largest by land area?
questions.explanation: Asia is the largest continent in the world!
